history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to State, Veterans, & Military Affairs

House Committee on Finance Refer Amended to Appropriations

House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Finance

Senate Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Senate Third Reading Passed with Amendments
